item.title: Silrted drain, 23rd February
item.description:
We recently had drains cleared in Springbourne Court, it was noted that the main drain on Foxgrove is silted so this will need to be cleared to stop further issues in the sounding area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxgrove Road, Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping behind cedar Court - 148 Lensbury Way, 23rd February
item.description:
Someone has dumped household waste and plastic. The pile of rubbish is about 6ft high and all along the back of the properties 140 - 148. There are rats and mice.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Overton Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Brecknock Road, 23rd February
item.description:
You closed previous reports of potholes in the middle of the road all along Brecknock Road by simply saying it is not the council's responsibility. Could you please let me know whose responsibility these serious potholds are?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Brecknock Road, Archway, Greater London

item.title: Abandoned car without licence plates, 23rd February
item.description:
There is a car parked in the Sir Walter Raleigh Court underground car park next to the central stairwell, that is not in an actual space. It does not have licence plates & this is now the 3rd time this has happened. It is not permitted to park here however the parking control company cannot issue a ticket without the vehicle’s registration number.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Banning Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipped small tyres (Abbey Road), 23rd February
item.description:
A pile of tyres (smaller than car tyres) has been fly-tipped on Abbey Road on the pavement. The tyres are half-way between the elevated walkway and Fossington Road, on the Lesnes Abbey side of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 393, Abbey Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Public bin by bus stop H Lower Road, 23rd February
item.description:
The public bin by bus stop H on Lower Road was caught on fire and smoking so may be damaged. The fire brigade were notified and a crew was being sent to put the fire out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car with French reg CP 140 FV, 23rd February
item.description:
A dark blue Ford car with French number plates CP 140 FV and a smashed front headlight appears to have been abandoned on Abbey Road, near the junction with New Road. The car has been in the location for several days and has parking tickets. It is parked on double-yellow lines and on a cycle path, thereby causing an obstruction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 455, Abbey Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bin not emptied, unable to report on other form it says can’t help, 23rd February
item.description:
Recycling bin not emptied for 1 month

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pulteney Mews, Avery Hill

item.title: A tree planting request, 23rd February
item.description:
I would like to ask you to plant some trees along the road between the driveway of the 30 Mays Hill Road and Kingswood Road. There is a neighbourhood initiative to have more greenery introduced to the sides of the road, and some trees were already planted in front of my neighbours' homes. Conifers are preferred and if it matters, redwoods are my favourite. Thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): May's Hill Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Great Queen Street, Holborn, Greater London
